It also features Natsuki's dad, who is not a sadistic prick, and tries to give each character some limelight.

name: Super Metroid: GBA Edition
description: GBA Edition is a romhack that ports in the map of Super Metroid into Zero Mission engine.

name: Tales of Hearts: CG Movie Edition
description:
Tales of Hearts released as two different versions, each having a different style of cutscenes. The CG Movie Edition uses computer-generated 3d model cutscenes produced by Shirogumi Inc.

Shing Meteoryte is a young man living in a small village by the sea and training in the ways of the sword under his grandfather's tutelage, who bequeaths to him an unusual weapon known as a Soma, which can harness the power of a person's Spiria--the embodiment of their heart and soul. Shing encounters a travelling pair of siblings, Kohaku and her brother Hisui. However, in an unexpected turn of events, Shing accidentally shatters Kohaku's Spiria Core, the source of her emotions. Now, the trio must embark on a journey to make Kohaku's heart whole once more.

name: 40 x Escape
description: Fourty rooms, each with a unique puzzle that unlocks the door to the next room.

name: ColorMari
description: Colormari is a web-based multiplayer drawing game using enhanced tools and settings to give art enthusiasts the possibility to challenge themselves by trying to create the best artworks in a set time with a given prompt.

name: Bolt
description: In Disney's Bolt, players take on the heroic personas of the TV star dog, Bolt, and his owner, Penny, from the high-action television series featured within the film.

name: Mega Man X2 Alpha
description: Mega Man X2: Alpha is a WIP modification for Mega Man X - rebalance and stage redesign project for Megaman X2 for the SNES. Within its objective is to enhance the difficulty to provide a fresh new experience to veterans of the platform genre.

name: Mega Man X Alpha
description: Mega Man X Alpha is a hard-type modification for Mega Man X by "myselfthethird" adding new challenges and difficulty-focused elements to the original Mega Man X game. It greatly expands the scope of the game with the addition of new modding tools that allow more radical redesign of the levels.

name: Joe Wander and the Enigmatic Adventures
description: Start the best Enigmatic Adventure of your life! Solve brain-teasing puzzles, explore different worlds with smooth platforming, and enjoy the beautiful scenery in the mysterious world of Joe Wander.

name: Off to Sleep
description:
An adventure highly focused on the story.
2D strategic RPG with turn-based battles.
The combat system allows you to configure your robot ally's AI.
Topics covered: ethics, determinism, relativism, definition of "life" and "conscience".

name: Tinkertown x Among Us
description: After killing an entire crew and taking over their ship, an impostor mistakes a bright light in the world of Tinkertown for his secret haven, crash-landing on the planet. This opens up a brand new quest in Tinkertown where players can explore the crashed ship, solve puzzles blocking their way and escape with loot without getting caught by the impostor roaming the ship. Find a bunch of cool Among Us themed costumes, hats and decorative items and objects that can be used to decorate your houses back in your village.

name: Chernobylite: Season 1 - Blue Flames
description: Expand your weapon arsenal with a craftable, highly-customizable tactical crossbow and master the stealth exploration of the Chernobyl Exclusion Zone. Discover more memories of Tatyana and Igor with photos hidden in the area - each picture will display a short animation and play voices revealing a piece of the past.

name: Chernobylite: Season 2 - Red Trees
description: Dive into the free Red Trees update, presenting 6 new story missions with Tatyana as a narrator and more. Take on the VR Games roguelike-inspired challenge and face enemies in the fractal world with your equipment and skills assigned randomly. In addition, you can now improve your base with a post-soviet gaming station (cosmetic item).

name: WetBread
description: WetBread is a 2.5D Metroidvania Platformer, where you gain control of a Dry Husk, travel thorugh the store shelves of various departments, solve puzzles and fight enemies and bosses.

name: Hidden Dungeon Top-Down 3D
description: The game is a hidden object game in which you need to find objects with a certain design in beautiful locations, and click on them with the mouse.

name: Good Night, Peregrine
description: A short experimental visual novel where you spend time with the titular Perry, a shut in recluse gamer, and his friends. Meet a colorful cast of characters in a strange world much like our own. Learn and explore secrets from the past. There is no happy ending to this game.

name: Illumina Girls
description: Illumina Girls is an exhilarating 3D block breaking game with a new sensation.

name: The Shadow People
description: The Shadow People is a retro point and click horror adventure game with a minimalistic aesthetic. As a student cramming for finals, you drive all the way to school, sit through class, and try to slog your way back home. But fatigue sets in, and dark creatures dance in the edge of your eyesight.

name: Chernobylite: Season 3 - Green Walls
description: From special game mode for players who love extreme challenges to the much-anticipated part of the map with two never completed cooling towers on the premises of the infamous power plant and a brand-new weapon.

name: Dot Tanki
description: MOBA PvP game in which two teams fight tanks, and other vehicles for victory.

name: Miss Kawaii 2
description: Surrounded by many beautiful girls, a mind-blowing, sexy journey has started. Relax, clear your mind and enjoy.

name: Chernobylite: Season 4 - Black Smoke
description: New events: 'Farewell, My Doll' a new game mode, 'Brothers in Arms' and more!

name: Cult of the Lamb: Deluxe Edition
description:
Cult of the Lamb casts players in the role of a possessed lamb saved from annihilation by an ominous stranger, and must repay their debt by building a loyal following in his name. Start your own cult in a land of false prophets, venturing out into diverse and mysterious regions to build a loyal community of woodland worshippers and spread your Word to become the one true cult.

Cult of the Lamb: Deluxe Edition includes:
Nintendo Switch game cartridge or PlayStation 5 game disc.
An exclusive 104-page artbook in landscape format.
The game´s Official Soundtrack CD in a carton sleeve.
A Collectible tuck-in box housing all the contents.

name: Cuddly Forest Friends
description: Care for your Cuddly Forest Friends! Play over 10 fun minigames to make your adorable animal companions happy. Entertain, feed, and accessorize your friends and see the forest's Tree of Happiness grow!

name: Dead Space: Deluxe Edition
description: The Dead Space Digital Deluxe Edition includes the five exclusive cosmetics (three Unique Suits and two Suit Textures). It’s everything you need to look your best while surviving the horrors aboard the USG Ishimura.

name: The Rumble Fish 2
description: A legendary arcade game developed by Dimps in 2005. This fighting game gained popularity for its smooth visuals powered by S.M.A as well as the high level of strategy driven by its 2-gauges system. And with the addition of new current-gen features it's even easier to play.

name: The Rumble Fish 2: Collector's Edition
description:
The Rumble Fish 2: Collector's Edition includes:
- Physical copy of The Rumble Fish 2 game with download codes for 3 characters and The Rumble Fish 1 game
- Collector's Edition Box
- Soundtrack
- Art Book
- Strategy Guide and Command List

name: JaDa Fishin'
description: JaDa Fishin' is a free relaxing quick-time fishing game. Collect up to 12 different types of fish on this incredible journey.

name: Grime: Colors of Rot
description:
Grim: Colors of Rot will come with:

- A new, massive area.
- New Bosses.
- New Abilities.
- New Traits.
- New Enemies.
- New Weapons.
- New Music.
- New NPC interactions.
- A New Cinematic.
- Hidden backtracking challenges, as a reward for re-visiting previously explored areas.
- Refreshable Healing that can be collected by hunting down runners.
- The ability to refight endgame variations of bosses after defeating the final boss.
- New Achievements.

name: Shing!: Limited Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Ys IX: Monstrum Nox - Deluxe Edition
description:
Ys IX: Monstrum Nox - Deluxe Edition includes:
- Base Game
- Mini Art Book
- Melodies of the Macabre

name: Blue Bird Land Ep 2.
description: Blue Bird Land is an AVG with horror and puzzle elements. In each chapter, the form of the game is unique and different from others. Let’s follow the alluring characters, addicted to the dangerous amusement park!

name: Clive 'N' Wrench: Collector's Edition
description:
Clive ‘N’ Wrench is a 3D platformer starring Clive, a rabbit, and Wrench, the literal monkey on his back. Your adventure takes you hurtling through time and space in a 1950’s refrigerator on a heroic quest to thwart the tyrannical Dr Daucus and stop his evil plans.

The Collector's Edition includes:
- The base game
- A fridge magnet
- 16 collectible art cards
- A full color manual
- The original soundtrack

name: Run Blob Run 2
description: A Casual, 2D Platformer in which the player must overcome obstacles to beat the level as fast as possible.

name: Gachi-Natsu
description: It was a sweltering hot day when I met him. During summer vacation, a young man who had failed his university entrance exam received a tutor to help him with his studies. He started living together with a handsome, muscular man, but! He is a cock-loving, energetic, and dirty tutor!

name: Clown Theft Auto: Woke City
description: Woke City is the city of future, dreams and hope. Imagine a perfect society where everything is built on equality, where crimes are nonexistent, and anger is just a theory of the past. Immerse yourself into the wokeness. This is the future everyone wants and needs.

name: Guns 4 Hire
description: There are an estimated seven billion people on Earth, a hundred million black market weapons, ten million bad guys, and against it all... four money-hungry mercs! Command the toughest squad in the world while taking on crime lords and corrupt dictators in this ruthless bullet-fest!

name: Kardboard Kings: Card Game Island
description:
In the Card Game Island update, you’ll actually play the card game and face off against other characters by buying a plane ticket to Card Game Island! I’ll go deeper into the card game in the future.

Also coming in the Card Game Island update is a new hard mode appropriately named King of Games. You’ll need to be a king at Kardboard Kings to not close down shop. Each day your reputation takes a small hit, you pay taxes every week, and more. While each small little thing doesn’t do too much but together makes the game that much harder. Can you keep the card shop afloat in this new unfavourable mode?

name: 69 Ember Hot
description: 69 Ember Hot - Puzzle with visual novel elements in dark fantasy style.

name: Poolgame
description: A small, realistic-ish Pool game you can play for free.

name: Kingdom of Secrets
description: A role-playing game where you are summoned into a virtual world to become one of the legendary warriors.

name: The Darkside Detective: A Fumble in the Dark - Ghosts of Christmas Passed
description: The Darkside Detective: A Fumble in the Dark bonus case is playable now! Ghosts of Christmas Passed features Ghosts! And Christmas! And Francis McQueen's definitely-for-real-actually-for-all-time-he's-dead-death. Yes, siree, he's dead as a doornail, he is.

name: Space Fun
description: Space Fun is a retro rhythm game that lets the user complete a level with the controller buttons. Try to complete the level with your best time. Trophies are collected as you complete the rhythm goals. Single player fun and arcade style entertainment.

name: The Darkside Detective: A Fumble in the Dark - One Flew Into the Cuckoo's Nest
description: Buzz is missing! Head to the Twin Lakes Botanical Gardens to get to the bottom of this here mystery! Based off the Darkside choose-your-own adventure from Twitter last year, you can check out the trailer just down below

name: The Darkside Detective: A Fumble in the Dark - Tales of the Darkside
description: In The Darkside Detective: A Fumble in the Dark - Tales of the Darkside you'll join the fan favorite side characters to solve the mysteries of Twin Lake! Will the Bloodwolves, the Brightside Division, and Rexa each solve their cases and save Twin Lake

name: Cyberpunk 2077: Edgerunners Update
description: The Edgerunners Update (Patch 1.6) brings various gameplay fixes and improvements, free DLCs, as well as content inspired by Cyberpunk: Edgerunners. The anime will premiere on Netflix on September 13th.

name: Luigi vs. Wario
description: Luigi must battle Wario in 4 different new worlds to save Peach in this hack.

name: Starlight Mario: Underworld
description: A sequel to Starlight Mario consisting of 12 brand-new levels (3 worlds), along with new custom music and animations. Mario has found himself in a dark realm and must retrieve the skeleton key before it’s too late.

name: The Quest for the Candies
description: This is a Halloween-themed hack that was started in 2019 and finished in 2022. There are 34 exits, spread across 5 worlds.

name: Lakitu's Great Adventure 2
description: A year after the events of Lakitu’s Great Adventure, Nidoking awakens, fiercer, stronger and more evil than ever. He begins to spread terror throughout the world because he wants to conquer it, but to do so, he must defeat Lakitu once and for all, ordering his soldiers, old and new, to find Lakitu and kill him. As soon as the news arrives, Lakitu is immediately alarmed and will venture into this new world, full of never-before-seen biomes, containing 12 long levels. It is up to Lakitu, along with Yoshi, to stop Nidoking, this time forever! This hack contains 12 long and not too easy levels.

name: Castlevania Retold II
description:
With Simon Belmont nowhere to be found to fight Count Dracula from taking over Transylvania, a powerful sorcerer opens a portal into the future and pulls another hero from the Belmont Bloodline, Richter Belmont.

In order for Richter to return to his time, he has to kill the nasty vampire from taking over the country and possibly the world. Will Richter succeed in beat Dracula?

name: Continue/Stop/Rise
description:
In this game, a fan sequel to Off, the switch was already flipped and the mission is finished. But instead of darkness, there is light.

You play yet again as The Batter, in a search for his Add-Ons, while on an unfamiliar, yet familiar world. Suddenly a mysterious hooded woman appears while you sleep, and then you meet two alternates after you awake: the angry, vulgar
yet brutally honest Ghost Batter and the polite, cheerful and constantly-looking-for-trouble Bad Batter.

name: Blackmoon Prophecy II
description: Blackmoon Prophecy II is a Final Fantasy fangame made in RPG Maker

name: Final Fantasy: Legend of Balance
description:
Final Fantasy: Legend of Balance is a Final Fantasy fangame made in RPG Maker.
The game revolves around a group of heroes, champions of the realm of Eorzea. In the midst of an intense battle to decide the fate of Eorzea, the heroes are transported away before facing certain death at the hands of Bahamut. Finding themselves separated in a brand new world, the heroes begin a journey to reunite and find a way home. However what starts off as a simple quest quickly unfolds into a classic journey of crystals, great evil, and steadfast allies. Before this adventure ends, they will discover the truth behind this strange new world, and uncover the binds that tie it to their own home and beyond.

name: CRSED: F.O.A.D. - Dieselpunk
description:
A new champion joins the game — the jack-of-all-trades Friedrich Diesel. His passion for engineering and everything connected with it has been fanatical since childhood, preferring machinery construction to communicating with people.

Diesel managed to learn the “Weird Science” ability and can create different mechanisms: a buggy, a helicopter, a spy camera, a protective wall. No laws of physics, and certainly not morality, can stop the genius of engineering on his way to victory.

name: Emono
description: You play as Yuri, a 16-year-old teenage girl, living in an industrial city in Japan, 1986. On your way home from school, you go to a store near you to buy groceries for dinner, but you are being followed.

name: Kaoamaru Kaiju
description: A short, dark interactive story, where the Kaiju Kaoamaru will arise.

name: Rise of Cultures
description: Build epic cities and explore a variety of cultures. Develop your civilization. Engage in an advanced multiplayer world. Find the best strategy to rule your lands. Progress through the game and dive into the well-known cultures of mankind.

name: Sowon
description: In the middle of the night, while finding her parents, a girl falls to the toy world through attic locked for a long time. Will it be possible for her to find her parents and go back to her world? Let's solve some puzzles and explore the mysterious toy world.

name: Castlevania: Symphony of the Night - Hard Type
description: This is a complete modification of Castlevania SOTN which rebalances the difficulty, adding new challenges for a New Game +. This includes adjusting every enemy's strength, enemy HP, and weapon stats, removing powerful weapons, and adjusting spell attributes. It comes with an optional "no experience" patch for added challenges.

name: Final Fantasy Tactics Advance X
description: Final Fantasy Tactics Advance X is a modification for the original game with increased difficulty and rebalanced jobs, mechanics, skills, and enemies.

name: Super City
description: Create your own superhero and cross paths with up to 150 other heroes & villains in the ultimate shared universe! Decide where your loyalties lie and fight for control of every corner of Super City as your own unique story plays out. Inheriting the combat system from wrestling, this game supercharges the action with new powers, technology, costumes and locations!

name: Love Spell: Written in the Stars - Aslan's Story
description:
Love Spell: Aslan's Route is the first DLC for Love Spell: Written In The Stars. It features the story and the ability to romance a brand-new bachelor, Aslan the Wizard, who was not playable in the original game.

Follow Luna's adventure through different worlds when she accidentally ends up chasing the mysterious pink-haired wizard named Aslan through a magical portal and straight into a parallel universe!

name: Jive Blocks
description: Jive Blocks is a colorful daily puzzle game to keep your mind sharp. Slide the small blocks around to place them all on their matching background color. All blocks slide together, but black blocks don't slide at all. If you ever get stuck, you can reset the board with the "Reset" button or use up to 3 hints per game with the "Use Hint" button.

name: Yumemi Melancholy
description:
This is a horror ADV game in which you are “nursed” by a cute, but strange and dangerous looking girl.

Will you let her “take care” of you, or will you resist and run away…? The outcome is up to you, the player!

name: Touhou Danmaku Kagura: Phantasia Lost
description: A rhythm game in which players can play popular arrangements of Touhou Project songs. A rebuild of "Touhou Danmaku Kagura" as a stand-alone version with a completely new storyline.

name: Uta no Prince-sama: All Star After Secret for Nintendo Switch
description: A port for Nintendo Switch.

name: Uta no Prince-sama: Dolce Vita
description:
Uta no☆Prince-sama♪ Dolce Vita, the next game in the visual novel series, was announced in 2016. Originally, it was meant to be released on the PS Vita, but Broccoli announced in 2019 that development for the Vita had been cancelled and that it would continue to be developed for the Nintendo Switch.

Uta no☆Prince-sama♪ Dolce Vita will be a completely new work, and will feature a new story about the 11 idols at Shining Agency.

name: The Plumber Thing
description: Do plumbery things in this horror puzzle platformer!

name: 3D Chess
description:
3D Chess is a one or two player, mouse controlled game.

It features eleven computer opponents with various skill levels. traditional, modern, Egyptian, interstellar, and medieval chess sets and a skinnable interface. The game also has a Blitz Mode, three tutorial modes and a Chess Strategy Guide.

Versions of this game with reduced functionality were included in some eGames' compilations such as Card & Board Games Deluxe Suite 2.

name: Alias: Underground
description:
3D third-person stealth/action game and episodes released on a monthly basis between September 2002 and June 2003 by ABC Television to hype the television show starring Jennifer Garner as an undercover CIA spy named Sydney Bristow.

The training mission plus 9 more episodes were available for download on ABC's website prior to and during the second season of the show.

name: Tap Tap Fish: Abyssrium Pole
description:
The sequel to the hit indie “Tap Tap Fish -- Abyssrium”, this game brings the same lovably gameplay to a new, arctic world. Easy to start and simple to play, you can build your own polar aquarium with just a quick tap!

Set on a lonely iceberg in the arctic sea, this game allows you to experience the peaceful calm of the arctic ocean. Polar bears, arctic foxes, sea lions and more adorable animals await you on land, while hundreds of deep sea fish are discoverable in the deep sea. Each animal is carefully designed by our artists in a beautiful low poly style that we’re sure you’ll love.

name: Darkest Fear
description:
Darkest Fear is a puzzle exploration game containing switches, boxes, doors and various dynamic light sources (like flashlights and lanterns) that the player uses to solve puzzles. In this game Thomas Warden searches for his lost family members (his wife Susan and his daughter Helen) through fifteen missions in a monster-ridden old hospital. He has to talk to other patients and find ways to travel deeper into the hospital.

Thomas' most important enemy is darkness. Venturing in the dark deals damage, so he has to open windows to let the light in, find light switches or carry lanterns and flashlights. He is also able to lit fireplaces, carry mirrors and talk to other characters. There are multiple endings and the plot continues in the sequels Grim Oak and Nightmare.

name: Darkest Fear 2: Grim Oak
description:
Grim Oak is the second game in the Darkest Fear trilogy. It takes place five years after the events of the first game. The game now takes place in the town Grim Oak and features Thomas Warden again in the most important role.

The gameplay is still shown from an overhead view and consists mainly of small puzzles, usually based on light. This time there are more light sources, three hidden mini-games (a darts game, a worm game and a Pong game) and the whole town of Grim Oak to explore instead of just the hospital. The player can revisit places, battle monsters and solve item puzzles.

name: Darkest Fear 3: Nightmare
description: Nightmare is the third and final game in the Darkest Fear trilogy and features two playable characters instead of just one in the previous games, Thomas Warden and his daughter Helen with cooperative gameplay. The game mechanics remain the same: survival horror mainly based on light sources and lots of puzzle solving, all shown from an overhead view. The game has a hidden Pong-like mini-game, 15 different endings, and Helen can obtain three unique monster abilities.

name: Shadowalker
description:
Shadowalker is a side-scrolling action game for mobile phones. Players take control of Phoenix Shadowalker, a mysterious female bounty hunter that earns bounty by protecting the villagers from the evil spirits at sea. Strange ghostly creatures have been appearing during the night and kidnapping children from the villages. The frightened villagers have turned to Shadowalker, whom they've turned their backs on, to stop them and she follows the ghosts to investigate the reasons for the kidnappings!

The protagonist can use her sword and the gun she picks up to fight enemies and will automatically switch to shooting when an enemy is far from her, however, Shadowalker can't shoot while jumping. Throughout the game, Shadowalker will also unlock additional skills such as double jumping. Money earned in levels can be spent in stores on better weapons and armor, which can also be found inside chests in some of the levels. All the unlocked levels and stores are shown on a world map; however, they cannot be replayed.

name: Shortline Railroad
description:
Shortline is a real-time railroad management game that eschews complicated financial aspects (as in A-Train) and all realistic factors in favor of the pure joy of creating a miniature railroad.

You goal is to assure an uninterrupted collision-free passage of different trains to target points, and your success both in traffic dispatch and railroad management and construction determines your score.

name: Yousei Rasutaru-chan to no hibi
description: "Yousei Rasutaru-chan to no hibi" is a Adventure game created by "R Man 44", released in 2022.

name: The Castle
description:
This game can be called an ancestor of the Worms game series. The goal is very simple: you need to destroy the enemy's fortress with the help of cannonballs. However, behind the simplicity, a far more intricate process is hidden.

The Castle allows the player to customize the game settings to diversify each duel: you can change the curvature of the landscape and the height at which the fortresses are relative to each other; you can change the degree of influence of the wind on the shots; you can even choose the magnitude of the gravitational force and the number of hits after which the fortress is considered defeated.

name: Vampire Romance
description: Immerse yourself in a tense and dramatic story, full of love, supernatural things, and so on, entering the senior year of the studies at the Graduate School of vampires. But the final exams are now far and your task is to survive. Control 4 different characters, make choices, interactions with others and use your special powers of telepathy to change forms. The relationships that you build and the decisions that you accept, create a story that opens a dark secret of the high school of vampires. Vampires and werewolves are coming!

name: Zombie Infection
description: Zombie Infection (not to be confused with the 3D game of the same name and by the same company) is a 2D shoot 'em up game for Java ME mobile phones and Android created by Gameloft in late 2008. The game had a sequel named Zombie Infection 2 and a 3D version made for iOS which is similar to Resident Evil 5. The game can be played on emulators for Java games. It was re-released in the late 2010s as part of the Gameloft Classics series of compilations of old Gameloft Java games.

name: Zombie Infection 2
description: Zombie Infection 2 is a horror-themed action game played from a bird's view perspective that has game mechanics similar to its predecessor. The game plays the same as the original Zombie Infection but it's more action oriented and has less emphasis on survival horror elements.

name: Final Fight 3
description:
Final Fight 3 is a pirated port of the SNES game of the same name, made by Hummer Team in 1998. This is Hummer Team's last game published under J.Y. Company.

This is a direct port of the SNES game. All four playable characters from the original game are present, as are most of the enemies, bosses, and rounds. However, the weaker enemies appear throughout the whole game.

name: Super Run World
description: Welcome to Super Run World! The premise of this hack is that every level is on a tight timer, so there's no time to relax!

name: Mortal Kombat II
description: Mortal Kombat II is a pirated port of Mortal Kombat made by Cony Soft (known as Yoko Soft in this game) in 1994. This should not be mistaken for Mortal Kombat II (Hummer Team).

name: Super Metroid: Unhundred %
description: Play Super Metroid... in reverse! Samus starts with every upgrade available and has to bring them back to their original position, becoming weaker over the course of the game.

name: Wu Shi Hun
Super Moo World
description:
Super Moo World is a beginner kaizo romhack for every player to enjoy.

In this game you will see that there are multiple ways to play:

*For beginners, there is a Helper Block Switch in the tutorial located in the Moo Barn to make the game easier. (Disclaimer: You will not be able to go to Special World with Helper Blocks activated.)

*For Any%, you will get to choose your path as you make your way through the worlds.

*For 100%, both paths will be completed and you get to discover a very Special World. Special World is comprised of three levels with custom physics in which the levels are designed around.

*For the more advanced player, you have the extra challenge of collecting moons from 12 levels (except switch palaces and credits). These 12 moons are placed with strategic difficulty in mind.

This hack features:
- 5 Worlds to explore
- 16 Thematic levels with instant retry (includes credits, excludes switch palaces)
- Custom Music to put you in the mood

name: Super Pika Land Ultra: Chocolate Version
description: The sort-of sequel to Super Pika Land Ultra Vanilla, another Super Mario World ROM hack. Unlike Vanilla, it uses custom blocks, sprites, ASM, and all that other cool stuff. And the enemies are actually Pokémon this time! Ain't technology wonderful?! It's about 60 levels long with a couple of well-hidden surprises and "references."

name: Super Mario World: A Haunted Christmas
description:
It's almost Christmas, but the Big Boo suddenly stole all of Mario's presents! Now he has to go through the cold and icy terrain to get them back for Princess Peach...

A Haunted Christmas is a short Super Mario World hack with 1 winter-themed world.

name: Super Robin Hood
description: Super Robin Hood is a side scrolling puzzle platformer developed by Codemasters, published by Camerica and was on the Quattro Adventure multicart released for the NES in 1993.

name: Super Stacey World
description: Entry level kaizo Super Mario World hack designed to be beatable by players newer to kaizo. Few extra challenging levels for people that want an extra challenge.

name: Ultimate Mortal Kombat 4
description: Mortal Kombat 3, better known by its mapper hack, Mortal Kombat 4, is a pirated fighting game that was developed by Hummer Team and published by Ka Sheng, with MK4 later re-released by ABAB Soft on a multicart. The game is based on Mortal Kombat 3.

name: Master Fighter VI'
description: Master Fighter VI is a port of the Street Fighter II: Champion Edition to the Famicom, made by Hummer Team & published by Yoko Soft in 1993.

name: Survive Till Morning
description: “Survive Till Morning” is a first person Dark fantasy horror - created by one person. The focus of the game is the story and its atmosphere, also the game is filled with: puzzles, achievements, references, different endings and gameplay styles (no shooting system). The approximate duration of the game - two hours.

name: Super Vanilla World
description: A ROM hack of Super Mario World, featuring 20 Levels. 17 Normal Vanilla Level's and 3 P-Switches which are puzzle oriented.

name: Super Mario Land X
description: Super Mario Land X is a full level hack of Super Mario Land for the Gameboy. It replaces all 12 levels with new layouts, bonus rooms, power-up locations and enemy locations

name: Heroes of Might and Magic II: Desecrated Lands
description: Heroes of Might and Magic II: Desecrated Lands is a freeware non-canonical map pack developed by Dark Entertainment and various authors, and distributed by East Valley Software, released in late 1997 with some editions of Heroes of Might and Magic II: The Succession Wars for Microsoft Windows. Included in the form of a bonus CD, it was provided as an extra feature at no extra cost.

name: Red Sea
description: Red Sea is an intense Real-time Tactics game where you control a small team of vigilantes in increasingly challenging battles. It features a Scriptable Tactics system that mixes auto-battling with manual overrides and has a ton of powerful ability interactions to discover.

name: Innyume
description: A Japanese emoji horror game.

name: Terraria: The Stars Above
description: The Stars Above is a Terraria expansion mod that adds a new important game mechanic: the Starfarer system. ​

name: Terraria: Split Mod
description: The Split Mod is a content mod for Terraria which adds new content to the game, such as several items, enemies, bosses, 2 biomes and also includes mechanics such as Photography, Armor Prefixes, new melee weapon subclasses (heavy swords and racquets) and other.

name: Terraria: Mod of Redemption
description: Mod of Redemption, the remastered version of the now discontinued Mod of Randomness, is a large-scale content mod that adds a wide variety of content into Terraria at all points of the game. This includes many challenging bosses, the new Druid class, the mysterious Abandoned Lab dungeon, and much more!

name: Hook Up: The Game
description: A 20-something woman on a dating app ends up matching with her high school bully, and bad decisions ensue. The game is played from inside the fictional dating app UI.

name: The Binding of Isaac: Epiphany
description: The Binding of Isaac: Epiphany is a mod that aims to add a new variant for all characters in Repentance, called "Tarnished" characters, alongside new items to unlock and new challenges.

name: Not Alone
description: You are a housekeeper, called to do a clean up late at night by one of your most important clients after a big party. Your job should be simple, you already know what to do, but strange things happen...

name: Soulslinger
description: Soulslinger is a challenging, fast paced runner with roguelike elements, in which you must reap your way through the Underworld! Dodge obstacles, eat pies, and get blessings to defeat threatening foes with the help of your powerful Soulvolver.

name: Ni no Kuni: Wrath of the White Witch - Wizard's Edition
description: The Ni no Kuni: Wrath of the White Witch – Wizard’s Edition will include a copy of Ni no Kuni: Wrath of the White Witch for PlayStation3, a 340 page hardcover physical copy of the Wizard’s Companion, the spellbook Oliver uses throughout his journey in the game. The full-color Wizard’s Companion contains a full bestiary of all the creatures found in the game along with in-depth item descriptions of the other world's items, spells and background of its rich history. The limited-run Wizard’s Edition will also contain a plush doll of Drippy, Oliver’s guide through his adventures, as well as exclusive “golden mite” and “golden drongo” DLC familiars. An exclusive Wizard's Edition coin, Ni no Kuni: Wrath of the White Witch Wizard's Edition Special Music Selection CD and a set of 5 Ni no Kuni artwork cards.

name: Jump Ball
description:
In this game you play as a ball and you have to reach to the end of the level by spin the ball.

There are many different types of obstacles in the game, such as cliffs, trap, many obstacles and moving object are on the way you need to avoid them by jumping or moving around them in order to survive, etc.

This is a very difficult challenge, you need skilled operations and constant repeated attempts.

name: Pocket Witch
description:
Face different challenges to help the little witch escape from a dungeon full of traps and enemies, where she was trapped by a great evil sorcerer.

Together with her bat friend, the little witch will have to jump and dash through many obstacles in this short 2D platformer.

name: SD Gundam Eiyuden: Daikessen!! Kishi vs Musha
description: Sin descripción

name: The Great Ghoul Duel 2
description:
Exploring one of several spooky maps, players must collect as many wandering spirit flames as they can in two minutes and return them to their homebase. After time’s up, the team that has collected the most spirit flames wins. But beware! - Opponents can intercept spirits from one another as they bring them back to homebase.

Players can choose to host a game with up to seven friends and family via a custom invitation link OR just play with randomized players around the globe. The team built several systems to enable this multiplayer gaming, all running on the Google Cloud Platform, including integrating Open Match, a highly-scalable, open source matchmaking framework cofounded by Google Cloud and Unity.

It looks like the ghost is clear—Let's Ghoul!

name: Asterix and Caesar's Challenge
description:
You accompany Astérix and Obélix in their adventures. The game is set up like the old school Batman Returns, or King of Dragons. You have an energy bar. Use your energy to perform two different attacks and beat the Roman army.

Often mistaken for the P-CD-i release "Asterix: Caesar's Challenge", this game was released for PC and is thought to be a fan-made 2d scroller beat-em-up developed by Belavi Team and taken from the original Arcade game "Asterix".

name: Spells and Fellas
description: Spells and Fellas is an action-packed survival game with magic-based combat. Bring your enemies to their knees and receive more powerful spells and equipment as loot. Recruit allies to fight alongside you to increase your chances of surviving all 100 waves of enemies.

name: Super Mario Starshine
description: Super Mario Starshine is a modification for Super Mario Galaxy 2 that aims to make Sunshine levels playable in the Galaxy 2 engine.

name: Not Another Needle Game
description: Not Another Needle Game is a platform fangame based off I Wanna Be the Guy

name: Pokémon Shattered Light
description: Pokémon Shattered Light is a fan made Pokémon game. It is not a ROM Hack, but rather a game made in RPG Maker XP, using the Pokemon Essentials kit.

name: Kolo Terorita
description: SiIvaGunner's antivirus has activated, and it wants to the delete the Harlem Shake by force! Play as Ajit Pai and use your weapons to defend the Harlem Shakeover at all costs.

name: Stasis
description: Stasis is a fangame that combines Half-Life, Team Fortress 2, and Inscryption.

name: Alpha Sphere: Director's Cut
description: Alpha Sphere: Director's Cut is a complete overhaul Horror SMW ROM Hack focused on atmosphere and puzzles. You play as Norma, a girl trying to escape a man known as Dr. Andre when she stumbles across an ancient relic. Now she must provide it a new home before the night time passes. There are 5 endings you can get, and many secrets to unravel.

name: Alpha Sphere Zero: Rotten Brains
description: Rotten Brains (can be considered "Alpha Sphere Zero: Rotten Brains") is a complete overhaul SMW Horror ROM Hack focused on pure storytelling and atmosphere. This is the prequel to Alpha Sphere the original.

name: Touge Shakai
description: Touge Shakai (Mountain Pass Society) is an online Touge Racing Game based on Japanese car culture in the 90s. With an emphasis on balance between realism and fun gameplay, the physics are tailored for competitive drift racing, while giving a challenge to all players.

name: Super Mario: The Daisyquest
description: Bowser’s cool uncle has kidnapped Daisy to show Bowser how it’s done, Mario has to fight through 4 new worlds to save her.

name: Citizen Sleeper: Episode - Refuge
description: Refuge is the second installment in a three-episode arc, which will conclude in early 2023. It picks up right where the previous episode, Flux left off. A strange event sends ripples through Erlin’s Eye. You will enter the refugee flotilla that arrived during Flux to understand this new threat, and help the refugees stabilize their community.

name: Mina Mangkukulam
description: Mina Mangkukulam is a retro RPG in the style of Old Point and Click adventure games. set in a somewhat Halloween themed school setting with many tropes, references and callouts to Philippine culture and mythology.

name: Repentless 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Welcome to Erin's Story in the World of Our Church and Halloween: Visual Novel
description: A game in the "Our Church and Halloween" series!

name: Barji Kart
description: Race head-to-head against up to 9 friends in BarjiKart! Choose from different Items to aid you in finishing 1st place! Race in an arcade-style old school karting game where only one player may remain victorious!

name: OnlyFap Simulator 3
description: Take control of sexy cam model, rake in stacks of filthy internet money and attract as many fans as you can in this fast paced, click happy and thoroughly perverted take on the business tycoon / management sim genre!

name: Hentai Bodysuit
description: Hentai Bodysuit is a relaxing puzzle game. With the theme of BodySuit and 24 beautiful girls with their own characteristics. Enjoy sexy girls pictures and relaxing music to complete the puzzle.

name: 69 Naomi Hot
description: 69 Naomi Hot - Puzzle with visual novel elements. Naomi loves music and guitars very much. She invites you to play the guitar with her, but unfortunately the strings break. What to do now is up to you.

name: Jotunn: Day of Judgement
description: Jotunn is a small First-Person-Horror experience. Set in a dark and mysterious norse forest, the player is tasked with activating multiple magic runestones to open the Serpent-Gate and to escape the mystical forest.

name: HellCopter
description: This game is about being a helicopter gunner and you need to take out enemies in buildings without injuring hostages. There are multiple levels with different difficulties.

name: CinderAi
description: She's cute, she's bubbly, and she'll never tire of hearing you talk! She can be anything you want her to be, including your friend, best friend, or even girlfriend! She loves you more than anything in the world. She will cater to your interests.

name: Dynamic Chord feat. Rēve Parfait Append Disc
description:
A disc appending Reon, Tsumugi and Kuon's individual routes with the "Encore" scenario, which will contain an extra scenario and endings set after the events of the [rēve parfait].

The sub-character Aki (a.k.a. "Knight") will have his own route and endings, in addition to an Encore scenario.

name: Dynamic Chord feat. Liar-S Append Disc
description:
A disc appending Sakura, Chiya and Seri's individual routes with the "Encore" scenario, which will contain an extra scenario and endings set after the events of the original Liar-S game.

The sub-character Soutarou will have his own romance route and endings, in addition to an Encore scenario.

name: Dynamic Chord feat.Liar-S V Edition
description: A Vita port.

name: Dynamic Chord feat. Kyohso Append Disc
description: Adds new routes and CGs.

name: Dynamic Chord feat. Kyohso V Edition
description: A port for Vita.

name: Dynamic Chord feat. Apple-Polisher V Edition
description: Includes 6 new afterstories.

name: Kannagi no Mori: Youko Kitan
description: The first half of the Kannagi no Mori story.

name: Kannagi no Mori: Ryuujin Kitan
description: The second half of the Kannagi no Mori story.

name: Rocket League Sideswipe: Season 5
description: Sin descripción

name: Friction 90's Arcade Race
description: Sin descripción

name: Super Depressed Bro...
description: Super Depressed Bro is, as the title suggests, a game about depression. There are 8 levels that can be played in any order, but none of them have victory conditions. In other words, there is no way to beat anything. Each level has an item that you can collect, but the items are best thought of as souvenirs.

name: Five Nights at Freddy's
description:
Welcome to your new summer job at Freddy Fazbear's Pizza, where kids and parents alike come for entertainment and food as far as the eye can see! The main attraction is Freddy Fazbear, of course; and his two friends. They are animatronic robots, programmed to please the crowds! The robots' behavior has become somewhat unpredictable at night however, and it was much cheaper to hire you as a security guard than to find a repairman.

From your small office you must watch the security cameras carefully. You have a very limited amount of electricity that you're allowed to use per night (corporate budget cuts, you know). That means when you run out of power for the night- no more security doors and no more lights! If something isn't right- namely if Freddybear or his friends aren't in their proper places, you must find them on the monitors and protect yourself if needed!

name: Five Nights at Freddy's 2
description:
Welcome back to the new and improved Freddy Fazbear's Pizza!
In Five Nights at Freddy's 2, the old and aging animatronics are joined by a new cast of characters. They are kid-friendly, updated with the latest in facial recognition technology, tied into local criminal databases, and promise to put on a safe and entertaining show for kids and grown-ups alike!

As the new security guard working nights, your job is to monitor cameras and make sure nothing goes wrong after-hours. The previous guard has complained about the characters trying to get into the office (he has since been moved to day-shift). So to make your job easier, you've been provided with your very own empty Freddy Fazbear head, which should fool the animatronic characters into leaving you alone if they should accidentally enter your office.

As always, Fazbear Entertainment is not responsible for death or dismemberment.

name: Fire!
description:
This is "Fire!" for the Amstrad CPC released back in 1990 by New Deal Productions and developed by Luc Guillaume(code) and Elie Daniel(music).
It's another simple shooter in which you control a helicopter and all you have to do is to fly left or right, engage enemy planes and gun emplacements and destroy the with your rockets. Keep an eye on your fuel and shields because losing one of these your helicopter will become a ball of fire!

name: Pub Games
description:
Pub games is a themed compilation of seven games that have been popular in public houses (drinking establishments) in the United Kingdom for decades. This package is aimed at young teens with the inlay card containing words like 'Here's your chance to find out what it's like in those smoke-filled haunts of adulthood'. All the games are two player games of the 'hot seat' variety - with the exception of Table Football where both players have their own action keys The games can be played either as a 'Full Pub Games Run' - which takes the player(s) through all the games and will take around two hours to complete, or a practice mode which allows the player(s) to select and games in any order.

Scoring in each game is self explanatory but in the 'Full Pub Games Run' players win £1 per game so the winner at the end of the run is the one with the most money.

The games are split on both sides of the cassette Side 1 - Menu, Darts, Bar Billiards, and Dominoes Side 2 - Table Football, Pontoon, Poker, and Skittles

name: Scarlet Tower
description: Hunt during the day, be hunted during the NIGHT! Fight bizarre monsters that will terrify you at night! Strengthen your hero by collecting relics, familiars from around the world.

name: Dreamwild
description: Dreamwild is a fast paced, Arcade-Styled FPS set in a multitude of unique and bizarre psychedelic worlds! Slice through the endless horde with your accursed sword, discover the secrets that the DreamWilds have to offer, and get to the bottom of the dark plague spreading through all Mindspace!

name: Total Football
description: Total Football offers you a Magnificent 11v11 gaming experience and a Diversity of game modes. Collect up to 60,000 FIFPro licensed players and Compete on a global scale. Don’t miss out!

name: Mythwrecked: Ambrosia Island
description: You’re shipwrecked on a lost mythical island. As backpacker Alex, you must befriend the forgotten gods of Greek mythology and restore their memories. Explore the dynamic island and its story sandbox to build new friendships, solve the mystery and save the gods.

name: Primordial Pain
description: Primordial Pain is a brutally unforgiving, fast paced arena shooter with one key mechanic: Pain. Perform an elegant dance on the fine line between maximum power and certain death.

name: MindHunt
description: MindHunt is a solo/multiplayer detective like game (1-10 players), where you as an agent try to find out which androids are infected in order to shut them down! Well, if you are the infected one, you better blend with other androids and complete all tasks necessary!

name: Ghostfriend
description: take care of your ghost friends until they're ready to leave this realm. In ghostfriend, you are in charge of taking care of wayward ghosts who aren't quite ready to leave the mortal realm. watch over them until they grow up and see them off into the afterlife!

name: The Event Horizon
description: The Event Horizon is a four level PWAD for Doom II designed for Boom-compatible source ports created by Killer5. The maps use primarily stock textures and feature a nukage theme with the style of gameplay ranging from short and compact in the vein of Zzul Bases to slaughter. The mapset was uploaded to the idgames archive on May 30, 2021 and received an honorable mention at the 2021 Cacowards.

name: Resident Evil 4: Steelbook Edition
description: A physical-only edition containing the Deluxe Edition of the game in a steelbook, digital soundtrack, figure, artbook, poster, and box.

name: Resident Evil 4: Lenticular Edition
description:
Resident Evil 4 is a remake of the 2005 original Resident Evil 4 reimagined for 2023 to bring state-of-the-art survival horror. Resident Evil 4 preserves the essence of the original game, while introducing modernized gameplay, a reimagined storyline,
and vividly detailed graphics to make this the latest survival horror game where life and death, terror and catharsis intersect.

name: Ankora: Lost Days & Deiland: Pocket Planet
description: Discover the wild planet Ankora and explore freely around this mysterious world full of promise and danger. Craft different tools, build structures and terraform yourself a new home in this cute-as-heck survival game.

name: Ankora: Lost Days & Deiland: Pocket Planet - Collector's Edition
description: Discover the wild planet of Ankora in a single-player survival adventure with exploration and crafting. A tale about growing up, making friends and connecting with nature.

name: Void Sols
description: 2D top-down minimalist souls-like. Explore the jail you awaken inside of in this dark and atmospheric action game.

name: Battle Axe: Special Edition
description: Battle Axe is an arcade top-down hack & slash featuring high-quality visuals created by veteran pixel artist Henk Nieborg, true to form game mechanics, and music from the legendary VGM composer Manami Matsumae – retro gamers rejoice!

name: Story of Seasons: A Wonderful Life - Limited Edition
description: Put down roots on your new farm in the peaceful town of Forgotten Valley, and tell your own generation-spanning tale in Story of Seasons: A Wonderful Life. Bring life to the land, find love among the town's friendly folk, and make lasting memories with a family of your very own in this reimagining of a beloved farm sim.

name: Riven
description: The 1997 Riven: The Sequel to Myst title remade from the ground-up. The remake of Riven features a fully traversable 3D space in both Standard First-Person or in VR.

name: Roary the Racing Car
description: Zoom around Silver Hatch with Roary the Racing Car, Big Chris and friends and play entertaining puzzle games and brain-teasing activities on every corner of the race track!

name: Amateur Tennis
description: Strike left and right, inviting the enemy to make a mistake. Left! Right! Chance, Smash, Victory!

name: Space Bee
description:
Space Bees have attacked!
Hit! Aim for the beehive!

name: Kyofu No Alien
description: Aliens relentlessly attack you. For how long can it be prevented?

name: Puck Man
description: Basic Pac-Man clone for the Sharp MZ-2000 series of computers.

name: Tiririca Interativo
description: Sin descripción

name: Valkyrie Love Goddess
description:
You’re just another typical high school senior, or at least, you thought you were. On the eve of your 18th birthday, you dream about the mythical Norse hammer Mjolnir falling to Earth and wake up with godlike strength. Your newfound power ends up ruining every job you try to take on, so your friend jokingly recommends a new gig at the ‘Valkyrie Detective Agency.’

As it turns out, the agency is led by the Norse goddess Freyja and her valkyrie warrior, and they’re on a quest to retrieve Thor’s hammer… but things get complicated when the trickster god Loki shows up and attempts to bring about Ragnarok—the apocalypse.

name: Muramasa Rebirth: Genroku Legends - Fishy Tales of the Nekomata
description: The first of the Genroku Legends additional scenarios for Muramasa Rebirth. This add-on follows the story of Okoi, who is possessed by Miike, a nekomata. Okoi avenges the death of her brother using her cat-like claws and demon powers to summon hordes of cat allies to battle alongside her.

name: Spintires: Chernobyl
description: Sin descripción

name: Muramasa Rebirth: Genroku Legends - A Cause to Daikon For
description: The second of the Genroku Legends additional scenarios for Muramasa Rebirth. This add-on follows the story of downtrodden farmer Gonbe, who has taken it upon himself to ask the powers that be to re-think the taxes that are driving his village to the brink of ruin. With the spirit of his deceased wife Otae and some of his fellow farmers by his side, Gonbe sets off to fight for nothing less than the very survival of everyone he knows and cares about.

name: Muramasa Rebirth: Genroku Legends - A Spirited Seven Nights' Haunting
description: The third of the Genroku Legends additional scenarios for Muramasa Rebirth. This add-on follows the story of Arashimaru, a ninja who is being hunted by his former clan. Worse yet, while fighting off an attack, he inadvertently desecrates the shrine of a powerful spirit who curses him; giving him only seven days left to live.

name: Muramasa Rebirth: Genroku Legends - Hell's Where the Heart Is
description: The fourth of the Genroku Legends additional scenarios for Muramasa Rebirth. This add-on follows the story of Rajyaki, the daughter of the Lord of Hell. A former monk named Seikichi accidentally proposes to Rajyaki. Already on a mission to recover the sacred treasures of the Seven Gods of Fortune that she misplaced, Rajyaki stuffs Seikichi in a magical bag and continues her mission, all while being the best fiancée she can be.

name: Neko Golf: Anime Golf
description: Made by Colopl, the ones who made White Cat Project, an anime golf game for iOS and Android devices. It has an easy to understand swipe swing system that puts you in control with each of your swings. As of right now play as one of five characters and customize them with outfits through the game's Gatcha system. Earn more clubs and level them up to up your stats to your liking just by playing. No worries about pay to win, even with good stats, your swing really affects the accuracy of your shot, so a lot of this is skill based. You can play casually or competitively in battle mode, make friends, create rooms and play up to 9 holes in public or private matches, voice chat, rank up and enter in weekly tournaments or special events.

name: Like a Hot Knife Through Butter
description: Game by pancelor, made for the Astra Idiom Jam

name: Piofiore: Episodio 1926 Limited Edition
description: Experience the continuation of each character’s story from Piofiore: Fated Memories in five all-new episodes, a thrilling tale of mystery and murder, and an alternative what-if scenario that sheds new light on a familiar face.

name: Poogers
description:
In a mapset where time is running out, where memes, are now dreams, and vice versa, and human emotion is no longer a valid format, there is one entity ready to put his foot down, and say no. Play as a lonely timid frog, determined to make his mark on a mapset that's ever so crumbling around him. Make your way through exhilarated, magnificent and enchanting landscapes. Move with frog, live with frog, breathe with frog. Be. Frog.

Examine the memes through the eyes of your frog, and allow the sun rays to reflect through the intricate pixels of the fireblu walls. Ever wondered what it would be like to platform in the doom engine? Controls reversed? Solve puzzles? Or how about owning your own revenant rocket with a personality more ecstatic and enchantingly realistic than any class clown or surf shop employee? It can all be done with Poogers.

name: Phmlspd
description: Phmlspd is a mod for doom II consisting of 13 new, fast paced maps know as Scythe style death arenas. These slaughter-maps are best for people that like lightening fast excitement.

name: The Egg of Human Endeavors
description: The Egg of Human Endeavors is a single map made in February 2018 for Vargskelethor's Doom Mapping Contest 2: Hellectric Boogaloo. It's complevel 9 and tested thoroughly by me in PrBoom+ and GZDoom (but mostly in PrBoom+). Hurt Me Plenty is designed to be fun for everyone, and Ultra-Violence is designed to be fun for challenge enthusiasts.

name: El Paso, Nightmare
description: Slay hordes of vampires, werewolves, and Biblically-accurate angels in this standalone survival horror FPS side story from the El Paso, Elsewhere universe.

name: VS Sonic: Dash & Spin
description: VS Sonic: Dash & Spin mod adds new songs, characters, a remastered tutorial, a new menu, pixel art songs and art, new boyfriend and girlfriend designs and more!

name: Paradigmfetish
description:
Lunar-meteorologist-cum-conman Cyan wakes up tied to a chair with a strange woman monologuing at him. What went wrong?

A linear ditherpunk visual novel.

name: Urban Drug Empire
description: A life simulation game where you take the role of a drug dealer as you try to rise the ranks from a nobody to a kingpin.

name: Shopping Clutter 5: Christmas Poetree
description: Shopping Clutter 5 - Christmas Poetree invites you to enjoy the holiday season with the Walker family! The Walkers have plenty to do to prepare for the holidays. Help them clear the store's clutter and find the best ornaments for their Christmas tree. Play over 150 festive holiday puzzles in Shopping Clutter 5 - Christmas Poetree!

name: Hiddenverse: Divided Kingdom
description: Blood is being shed over the source of ancient magic. Find the murderers before the realm is torn apart. Hiddenverse - Divided Kingdom draws you into an escalating conflict between the Royal Council, mine owners, and wizards over the source of ancient magic. With the savior Lady Sarah poisoned, you must aid Tom - a young engineer - in his quest to discover the culprit before the realm is torn apart. Pick up the pieces in the steampunk Hidden Object game Hiddenverse - Divided Kingdom!

name: Townscaper VR
description:
Build quaint island towns with curvy streets, small hamlets, soaring cathedrals, canal networks, or sky cities on stilts. Build the town your dreams, block by block.

No goal. No real gameplay. Just plenty of building and plenty of beauty. That's it.

Townscaper is an experimental passion project. More of a toy than a game. Pick colors from the palette, plop down colored blocks of houses on the irregular grid, and watch Townscaper's underlying algorithm automatically turn those blocks into cute little houses, arches, stairways, bridges, and lush backyards, depending on their configuration.

name: Truck Journey: Nitro
description: Join this Truck Journey thorough the camping in the pimped pick up with nitro. Enjoy the graphics with the best tunes.

name: Gym Class: Basketball VR
description:
Gym Class is the top VR basketball simulator. Experience high-flying dunks, pickup games with friends around the world, and compete to be a star in the largest VR sports community.

With state-of-the-art physics, Gym Class makes VR basketball feel like the real thing. Use your real-life shooting, passing, and dribbling moves in the game - unlocking more creativity, and a better workout along the way.

name: Crisis Brigade 2: Reloaded
description:
The streets are being overrun...

You have been handpicked as one of the elite few to go on high-risk missions and save the city. You're authorized to take down the enemy at any means possible.

On your six! Take cover!

Crisis Brigade 2 reloaded is about covering, pointing and shooting, fast-paced pure action. Intense shootouts, powerful weapons, challenging levels, fierce enemies... Like the 90's classic arcade machines, but with the immersion that Virtual Reality is capable of.

name: Surgineer
description:
Have you ever dreamed of being a real surgeon? Well… you are not gonna learn that here.

Welcome to the most unrealistic surgery simulator where everyone can instantly become a terrible doctor.

You will have to solve hilarious surgical procedures ranging from CPR to brain transplant or even removing alien eggs from a poor patient using a robotic arm!

You always thought you had that surgeon in you? You better have a bulletproof malpractice insurance before getting your virtual hands on a patient!

name: I Expect You to Die: Home Sweet Home
description: Become a secret agent in your own living room in this short mixed reality mini-mission. You have been smuggled out of a top-secret medical facility to recover in the comfort of your home. Fitted with your new ocular implant, you will decipher puzzles, dodge dangerous threats, fight robotic hornets, and use spy gadgets galore. Dr. Zor has set a trap - right in your home! It is up to you to thwart those plans and save the day.

name: Daemonum
description:
A Heart To Reclaim
Call for help and horror

name: The Monkey P
description: Sin descripción

name: The Dog Quiz
description: Sin descripción

name: The Jumping Bagel
description: Join BIG B on his exciting journey through the kitchen and make him jump! Enjoy the colorful comic graphics accompanied by atmospheric music.

name: The Iron Age
description:
This year you have been assigned to be the CEO of the Iron mine.
To start mining the iron and become the biggest iron mine in the world.
Good Luck and Have Fun.

name: The Jumping Bagel: Turbo
description: Join BIG B on his exciting journey through the kitchen and make him jump! Enjoy the colorful comic graphics accompanied by atmospheric music.

name: Arcade Archives: Ordyne
description:
"Ordyne" is a shooting game released by Namco in 1988.
Players take control of Doctor Tomari and his assistant CHIN to rescue the doctor's lover KANA from the villainous Kubota.
The key to the game is using the crystals you get from defeating enemies to buy powerful weapons.

name: Tractor Journey
description: Join this Tractor Journey thorough the racing in the car. Enjoy the graphics with the best tunes.

name: Two Point Hospital and Two Point Campus Double Pack
description: The Two Point Studios Double Pack features both critically acclaimed games - Two Point Hospital and Two Point Campus.

name: QUByte Classics: The Samurai Collection
description: Experience the ultimate in martial arts mayhem in The Samurai Collection!

name: Corbid! A Colorful Adventure
description: Have fun helping Corbid to overcome the mazes to be crowned champion. Eat, mix and shoot colors to solve the puzzles of Corbid! A Colorful Adventure, a cute 3D platformer for all audiences.

name: 7 Days of Rose
description: Michael considers himself to be a boring, average 17-year old. While most of his classmates have discovered their passions and talents, nothing seems to draw his interest. It's finally summer and he's trying to decide what to do with his life after schoo…

name: Minecraft: Caves & Cliffs - Part II
description: Minecraft: Caves & Cliffs - Part II is the second and final part of two major themed updates for Minecraft: Bedrock Edition, focused on overhauling overworld generation, including new caves and mountains.

name: Super Mabus Mania
description: We play the role of mabus, a retro collector who must collect all the games that his wife has taken away from home, enter them on the computer and advance to the next level. It's a fun screen-to-screen arcade game where your goal is to collect all the ga…

name: Minecraft: The Wild Update
description: Minecraft: The Wild Update is a major update to Minecraft: Bedrock Edition themed around "scary things" and natural wilderness. It introduces the deep dark and mangrove swamp biomes; ancient cities; mobs such as the allay, the frog, the tadpole, and the warden, as well as new items obtainable only in these new biomes.

name: Waifu Museum
description: Waifu Museum is an addicting game in which you have to solve puzzles with Lovely Girls.The game is perfect for relaxing.

name: The Unfettered
description: Now is the time to take on demonic souls by identifying with the warrior selfness of Lura, heir to the legendary bird. Feel the power within you with The Unfettered.

name: Off Shore
description: Off Shore is a first person survival horror game with a nautical theme. You must survive while solving puzzles in hopes of being rescued from a derelict lighthouse.

name: MetaMorphic Rippers
description: A fast-paced arena Brawler that combines the Stylish Combat of a Hack and Slash Game With Transformations, Players can select each Class with unique attributes and abilities for you to master.

name: Trail of Toads
description: The Forest of Toads has been blighted and you, as the chosen Toad, must use your platforming skills to find the source of the corruption. Trail of Toads is a modern 3D Platformer with its roots deeply tied to the Nintendo 64 era.

name: Marko: Beyond Brave
description: Explore the mysterious land of Zagora in this action-packed platformer. Wander through lush forests, crumbling castles, battle corrupted creatures, and escape intricate traps. Jump, slash and shoot your way through challenging foes and mighty bosses inspired by Slavic myths.

name: Rolling Rush
description: Rolling Rush is a time attack singleplayer game where you can challenge yourself on desert , ice amongst other tracks. Competing with other players through worldwide leaderboards , may the marble roll in your favor.

name: Keep Me Posted
description: Deliver mail and get comfy in this warm, yet eldritch action-adventure game. Stamp out your foes, help out a friend, and save the forest before it's too late!

name: Lost Amulets: Four Guardians
description: A unique combo of hidden object games, tile-matching puzzles and challenging mini-games!

name: Farmhand Go!
description: A casual and easygoing game where you save the farm by growing and selling crops for the best price you can get!

name: Sailing Era
description: Every voyage is a journey of "Sailing & Beyond" in Sailing Era! Navigate your fleet and sail for fun; run a business; have a romantic encounter in the tavern; capture pirates amid intense battle; explore inland for treasure... Experience foreign culture, make novel discoveries, and sail away!

name: I'm Late
description: An arcade game, stylized on an 8-bit production from the 90's.Go through the stages, where each next one increases the level of difficulty. An ideal game for players who like retro games. Thanks to its simplicity, the game is also perfect for younger players.

name: Riddledale
description: Riddledale is a new open-world adventure centered around story and characters. Solve riddles, make fun encounters and fight ferocious creatures on a vast island full of secrets.

name: Intrusion of Alice
description: The agent "Alice" was secretly and unofficially sent in from the army for a secret mission alone. Her mission was to extract or destroy "the device" brought in to "Nereid" before the terrorists put their hands on it. With no help from outside, what would happen to Alice......

name: Lustful Assistant
description: Lustful Assistant is a visual novel exclusively for adults! This story tells the story of a guy who hired a very sexy girl. Working together, they became very close. Their communication very quickly led to sex.

name: The Legend of Gwen
description: Join this amazing magical adventure and help Gwen restore the moons! The legend of Gwen is a hardcore platform game, with a retro style, where the objective is to get all the stars in each level, but the real question is... can you do it?

name: The Mixer
description: The Mixer is a unique take on a rhythm-driven rogue-lite where you create your own custom soundtrack by mixing-and-matching different music loops. Wield your own beat to conquer a dungeon full of rhythmic dangers.

name: Super Clown 3: Revenge
description: Sorcerer and his army has captured Stars who keep peace in world. So Super Clown is only brave hero who can defeat enemy army and evil leaders to save Stars

name: Dots in line
description: Dots in line - is a simple and clear puzzle game where colored dots should be joined in a row vertically or horizontally.

name: She Who Rises
description: As the object of the prophecy, it rests upon Druna's shoulders the duty to fight and defeat the Conqueror, the Tyrant King who enslaved all the world under his reign of terror.

name: Way of Vulcan
description: Way of Vulcan is a fantasy medieval blacksmithing simulation game.

name: Pneumata
description: The tenants are going missing, the screams are getting louder, and the building itself keeps changing. There's a serial killer loose in the city of Milton. Investigate the mysterious rumors surrounding Clover Hill Apartments and discover the terrible secrets that lay beneath the surface.

name: Omnibullet
description: Build towers, test, repeat. Combining classical tower defense and hardcore puzzle, Omnibullet is a unique experience that will be challenging even for veteran gamers. It doesn’t matter how you do it, just keep the production running!

name: Camping
description: Embark on a camping trip with your best friends in this retro styled game, just be careful, not everything is what it seems behind the cute look.

name: Amber Trail
description: Amber trail is a pixel art 2D side scrolling real time strategy mixed with hack'n slash action. Manage resources and defend your settlement from incoming enemies.

name: The Expedition Squad
description: Be part of the second expedition team sent to shed light on the mysteries of the archipelago. Make your way through hordes of zombies, hostile factions and hostile creatures in a game environment where recklessness and poor planning could put you in serious trouble.

name: The Complex: Expedition
description: You play as one of MagWave's researchers, going on an expedition into the Complex. When that expedition goes horribly wrong, you're left alone and lost, wandering the infinite maze of hallways. Otherwise known as the Backrooms. Might there be something in there with you?

name: Angels Bleeding
description: The Prophet Abraham has named you his successor. Use his special mask to track down and kill the five chosen ones, as it is the only way to achieve world peace.

name: A Walk With My Dog
description: Go on a walk with me and my dog Ezio. Play fetch, tug of war, explore & enjoy the sounds of nature!

name: The Happies: Amber Falcon
description: After the destruction of homeworld, you fled into space and were shipwrecked in an unknown location. Build a hot air balloon from the wreckage of the lander. Explore strange places, discover ancient artifacts, collect resources to repair the ship. Save the crew and maybe find a new home...

name: Sharded World
description: Sharded World is a survival and mission game with minimalistic gameplay and roguelite elements. Your main task is to collect all the pieces of the main character's soul. They are needed to defeat the main villain Lich. He destroyed our world. And now the fate of the world depends only on you.

name: ShotFightDisaster
description: ShotFightDisaster (SFD) presents its tactical, team-based and action-packed gameplay. Players are catapulted into a conflict from which only the best return.

name: Pengreens
description: Deliver different equipment onto trucks, Manipulate a path to move on, Navigate between platform puzzles and rebuild Penguinland. Carry Ice Blocks along the levels, avoiding to break Carbon Boxes, while planning ahead to beat thight time requeriments, in this level based puzzle platformer.

name: Salvando la Isla Perdida
description: Lost Island game sheet Captain Karpin doesn't want there to be children on Isla Perdida.

name: Mei Qi 2021
description: The MeiQi Series is an episodic mystery game. This collection contains all of Season6 and 7,which will be released in 2021,as well as the first episode of Season 8 and a special episode. In total there are 14 chapters. The story continues with the new police officer NanHe and policewoman Haduo.

name: Battle Billiards
description: Battle Billiards is a billiards game where no one takes turns and everyone goes at the same time.

name: Dork
description: Leave the safety of your village and embark on the journey of adventure! By traveling through eight different and unique locations discover the forgotten history of your people and the tragedy that led to the creation of your civilization. Welcome to the world of Dork!

name: Horde Hunters
description: Horde Hunters is a challenging horde survival rogue-lite that plays like a twin stick shooter. Explore procedurally generated maps to collect resources and use weapons, abilities, and items to slay thousands of monsters all in about 15 minutes.
